hairy.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a hairy person or animal has a lot of hair on their body
hairy.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: a skinny guy with hairy legs
hairy.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: dangerous or frightening, often in a way that is exciting
hairy.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: It was pretty hairy climbing down the cliff.
